text: The Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts is a museum and art school in the city of Philadelphia in the state of Pennsylvania in the United States. It was started in 1805. It is the oldest art museum and art school in the United States. ==Famous students== * Katherine Milhous, American illustrator and author ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Schools in Pennsylvania Category:Buildings and structures in Philadelphia Category:National Register of Historic Places Category:Art museums in the United States Category:1805 establishments in the United States Category:1800s establishments in Pennsylvania
title: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts
